TEXT.source: Li-May Paiwan Data, Participant Zendar, file 02SN107-4

S.FORM: azua sika makaya a izua a patjetucu a kai, a kakudakudan, a palisi na paiwan zuku, mavan a izua pinu pinaljanan a sinan kakudan tua 'iniladjan.
'aw aicu a pinu pinui'inaljanan a sinan kakudan tua 'iniladjan 'inila'iladjan, kemasimaza taicu a matjatjalevalevak ta 'iladjan na vusam a kakudakudan.
aicu a matjatjalevalevak ta 'iladjan na vusam a kakudakudan namayatucu, a na tjasevalitan a 'iniladjan kata zaisang,
mavana sangasangasan a aljak a tjemalevak aya, ipu u'aljay ipu vavayan, kana sangasangasan a sinipualjak, timadju a tjemalevak a penuljat tazua sawzayan
ngadan nua uma' kata 'iniladjan i'inaljan, makeljang angata tu aicu a paiwan zuku mamamav a sipacunan tua vavay vavayavan katua u'alja'aljay,

manasika tjuruvuanga a vavayavayan a vusam a na'emiladj i'inaljan tucu, makeljang angata tu mamav a sipacunan tua vavayavayan katua u'alja'aljay na paiwan zuku, aicu mavana sikizengezenger nua paiwan zuku a cawcau uta.

aicu a seravar namaya paiwan zuku uta, ljakua maljiyan a kakudan niamadju, aicu a seravar semanvusam tua u'aljay, neka nu u'aljay a aljak nu neka nu aljak a nu neka u'aljay a aljak, mana seman vusam ta vavayan a aljak.
aicu a nasi na u'aljay kata vavayan tjara izua a patarevan, aicu a sikamamav nua u'aljay nua vavayan a palja paljavak tua ikacauan a kininemeneman,
kinasicuay nua paiwan zuku, kemasi tua sia sialangen sialangan tua nemanga, maljaluay aza sisan pazangalan tua u'aljay ta vavayan a langalj
katua vecik na djilung, na tjiuma, na kamavanan, kana sinicuayan a vecik izua sakamaya a pa'a'ecev tua vavayan tua u'aljay.
a kininemeneman nua paiwan zuku ini ka amin a 'em 'emuzimuzip na izua u'aljay a vavayan, aicu a icemecemel a nema namezangal tua nemanga izua namasan u'aljay namasan vavayan,

naseminamalji a pa'ulid a puvarungan nua sevalitan na paiwan zuku, mapu'atijen mapu'ataitjen a kizenger a mapuljat a paiwan zuku a cawcau, satje sanpazangali aicu a tjaljapena penapamavan a kakudakudan i tua tja'inaljan.
